    I am here to create a alliance. So we may win as a whole destron front. I will not be under your command. But you are free to ask for my services in def or attack situations. So we will easily defeat our enimies. But we do not have control on the other. I wish you to sent you ship into orbit and link with mine. Our base would be inpenatruble. But we would still have our two seperate factions.

  Yanshosh@... wrote: 










My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new group! 


I don't get mad at OOC posts too much, Orchid, they just take up post space.

::Shredder::

Shredder nods. He seemed to have troops, yes. He sighs, turning to the 
computer as it plays back a message from some new bot. He presses a button, 
sending a reply: "This is Shredder. Are you saying that you're joining the 
Destrons, under my command?"

<P>    I am here to create a alliance. So we may win as a whole destron front. I will not be under your command. But you are free to ask for my services in def or attack situations. So we will easily defeat our enimies. But we do not have control on the other. I wish you to sent you ship into orbit and link with mine. Our base would be inpenatruble. But we would still have our two seperate factions.<BR>
